turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Google, I would like to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What pizza restaurant do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't know. What are some of the ones near me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is Lobo Pizza and Sandia Pizza within one mile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do any of them deliver?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They both deliver. Which one of these do you want or do you want more options?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's order from Lobo Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How many pizzas do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's order two pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want the first pizza to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's order the Lobo Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size and crust do you want the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large pizza with a stuffed crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understood you want a large pizza. There is a problem with the crust. Lobo Pizza does not offer a stuffed crust. The crust choices are thin, tossed, or Chicago style. What is your choice?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will choose tossed crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understand you want a Lobo Pizza, large size, tossed crust. Is that all for the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is what I want for my first pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want for your second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a pepperoni pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size pizza and what crust do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large pizza and a Chicago-style crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any other toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni is the only topping I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understand for the second pizza ou want a pepperoni-only pizza, large size and a Chicago-style crust. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The two pizzas is all I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay. I see your payment information is on file with the restaurant.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is the total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total with tax and delivery charge is $23.99. Your pizza order is complete. I will submit your order to the pizza restaurant right now.
